item.title: How to convert sqlalchemy object to json in FastAPI
item.description: Have you struggled on How to convert sqlalchemy object to json in FastAPI? Do you know that fastapi has jsonable_encoder to do exactly this job? You just need to import from fastapi.encoders import jsonable_encoder Then use it on any sqlachemy object, or any object you want jsonable_encoder(Item) It’ll turn this object into a json
